statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT user_id FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT total_spending FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT loyalty_level FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT user_id, loyalty_level FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT total_spending, loyalty_level FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT user_id, total_spending, loyalty_level FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE total_spending > 100;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE loyalty_level = 'Gold';
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM loyalty_programs WHERE total_spending > 500;
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM loyalty_programs WHERE loyalty_level = 'Platinum';
SELECT user_id, total_spending, loyalty_level FROM loyalty_programs WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY loyalty_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT AVG(total_spending) FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT MAX(total_spending) FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM loyalty_programs WHERE total_spending > 1000;
SELECT user_id, loyalty_level FROM loyalty_programs WHERE loyalty_level = 'Gold';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT user_id, total_spending, loyalty_level FROM loyalty_programs WHERE total_spending BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT AVG(total_spending) AS average_spending FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM loyalty_programs WHERE total_spending < (SELECT AVG(total_spending) FROM loyalty_programs);
SELECT user_id, loyalty_level FROM loyalty_programs WHERE total_spending > (SELECT MAX(total_spending) FROM loyalty_programs);
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
SELECT SUM(total_spending) AS total_spending_sum FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM loyalty_programs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, loyalty_level FROM loyalty_programs WHERE total_spending > (SELECT total_spending FROM loyalty_programs WHERE user_id = 456);
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM loyalty_programs WHERE loyalty_level IN ('Gold', 'Platinum');
SELECT DISTINCT loyalty_level FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT user_id, total_spending, loyalty_level FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY loyalty_level ASC;
SELECT AVG(total_spending) AS average_spending, MAX(total_spending) AS max_spending FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM loyalty_programs WHERE loyalty_level LIKE '%m%';
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM loyalty_programs WHERE user_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT loyalty_level) AS unique_levels FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT user_id, total_spending, loyalty_level FROM loyalty_programs WHERE loyalty_level IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id;
SELECT name, amount FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT user_id, name FROM users WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, timestamp, NOW()) AS minutes_ago FROM transactions;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS total_users FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name = 'John' OR name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 10;
SELECT u.name, t.amount FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
SELECT u.name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id;
SELECT u.name, t.amount FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount > 100;
SELECT u.name, t.amount FROM users u LEFT JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT u.name, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id HAVING COUNT(t.transaction_id) > 5;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500);
SELECT u.name, MAX(t.amount) AS max_amount FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT u.name, AVG(t.amount) AS average_amount FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id GROUP BY u.name;
SELECT u.name, t.amount FROM users u RIGHT JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM transactions);
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM users;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY u.user_id;
SELECT u.name, t.amount, timestamp FROM users u LEFT JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE total_spending > 100;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE total_spending < 50;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount_spent FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT user_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT users.username, transactions.amount_spent FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id;

SELECT users.username, transactions.amount_spent, loyalty_program.loyalty_points FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id JOIN loyalty_program ON users.user_id = loyalty_program.user_id;

SELECT users.username, transactions.amount_spent, loyalty_program.loyalty_points FROM users LEFT JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id LEFT JOIN loyalty_program ON users.user_id = loyalty_program.user_id;
SELECT users.username, SUM(transactions.amount_spent) AS total_spent FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT users.username, AVG(transactions.amount_spent) AS avg_spent FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(transactions.transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT MIN(amount_spent) AS min_spent, MAX(amount_spent) AS max_spent FROM transactions;
SELECT users.username, AVG(loyalty_program.loyalty_points) AS avg_points FROM users JOIN loyalty_program ON users.user_id = loyalty_program.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT users.username, SUM(loyalty_program.loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM users JOIN loyalty_program ON users.user_id = loyalty_program.user_id GROUP BY users.username;

SELECT users.username, SUM(transactions.amount_spent) AS total_spent, SUM(loyalty_program.loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id JOIN loyalty_program ON users.user_id = loyalty_program.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(DISTINCT transactions.transaction_id) AS distinct_transactions FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE total_spending > 1000
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE total_spending > 5000 ORDER BY total_spending DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT u.username, t.amount_spent FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id
SELECT u.username, t.amount_spent, t.timestamp FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount_spent > 100 ORDER BY t.timestamp DESC
SELECT u.username, t.amount_spent, lp.loyalty_points FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id JOIN loyalty_program lp ON u.user_id = lp.user_id
SELECT u.username, SUM(t.amount_spent) AS total_spent FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id GROUP BY u.username
SELECT u.username, AVG(t.amount_spent) AS avg_spent FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING AVG(t.amount_spent) > 500
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND total_spending < 500
SELECT u.username, t.amount_spent, t.timestamp FROM users u LEFT JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id
SELECT u.username, t.amount_spent, t.timestamp FROM users u RIGHT JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id
SELECT u.username, t.amount_spent, t.timestamp FROM users u FULL JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id
SELECT DISTINCT u.username FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount_spent > 1000
SELECT u.username, t.amount_spent, t.timestamp FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, t.timestamp, NOW()) < 24
SELECT u.username, t.amount_spent, lp.loyalty_points FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id LEFT JOIN loyalty_program lp ON u.user_id = lp.user_id

SELECT u.username, t.amount_spent, COUNT(lp.loyalty_points) AS num_points FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id LEFT JOIN loyalty_program lp ON u.user_id = lp.user_id GROUP BY u.username
SELECT DISTINCT u.username, CASE WHEN t.amount_spent > 500 THEN 'High' ELSE 'Low' END AS spending_category FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id
SELECT u.username, t.amount_spent, t.timestamp FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM t.timestamp) = 10
SELECT u.username, AVG(t.amount_spent) AS avg_spent FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM t.timestamp) = 2021 GROUP BY u.username
SELECT u.username, SUM(t.amount_spent) AS total_spent FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY u.username
SELECT u.username, LPAD(user_id, 5, '0') AS padded_user_id FROM users u
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users;

SELECT name, total_spending FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT * FROM users WHERE total_spending BETWEEN 500 AND 2000;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;
SELECT AVG(total_spending) FROM users;
SELECT MAX(total_spending) FROM users;
SELECT MIN(total_spending) FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, email, total_spending FROM users WHERE total_spending > 5000;
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE total_spending > 1000;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE total_spending BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM users WHERE total_spending < 500;
SELECT name FROM users WHERE total_spending > 2000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT AVG(total_spending) AS avg_spending FROM users;
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE total_spending > (SELECT AVG(total_spending) FROM users);
SELECT name, total_spending FROM users WHERE total_spending IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MAX(total_spending) AS max_spending FROM users;
SELECT name, total_spending FROM users WHERE total_spending > (SELECT MAX(total_spending) FROM users) - 500;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE total_spending > (SELECT AVG(total_spending) FROM users) * 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE total_spending > 3000 OR name = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE total_spending > 500 AND name IN ('Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name = 'Alice' AND (total_spending > 1000 OR email LIKE '%@example.com');
SELECT name, total_spending FROM users WHERE name <> 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE total_spending > 500 ORDER BY total_spending DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE total_spending > 1500 AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name = 'Alice' UNION SELECT * FROM users WHERE total_spending > 2000;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users;
SELECT group_name FROM LoyaltyGroups WHERE points_required > 100;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM UserTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 50;
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
SELECT * FROM Rewards WHERE points_required < 500;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM UserTransactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, reward_name FROM UserRewards JOIN Rewards ON UserRewards.reward_id = Rewards.reward_id;
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UserRewards WHERE redeemed = TRUE;
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users WHERE total_spending BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT group_name, points_required FROM LoyaltyGroups WHERE group_id = 2;
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) FROM UserTransactions WHERE user_id = 789 GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users WHERE user_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM UserTransactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, reward_name FROM UserRewards JOIN Rewards ON UserRewards.reward_id = Rewards.reward_id WHERE user_id = 789;
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM UserTransactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users WHERE total_spending > (SELECT AVG(total_spending) FROM Users);
SELECT group_name, COUNT(*) AS num_members FROM LoyaltyGroups JOIN Users ON LoyaltyGroups.group_id = Users.user_id GROUP BY group_name;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users WHERE total_spending > 1000;
SELECT user_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Users JOIN UserTransactions ON Users.user_id = UserTransactions.user_id;
SELECT user_name, total_spending, reward_name FROM Users JOIN UserRewards ON Users.user_id = UserRewards.user_id JOIN Rewards ON UserRewards.reward_id = Rewards.reward_id;
SELECT user_name, total_spending, reward_name FROM Users INNER JOIN UserRewards USING(user_id) INNER JOIN Rewards USING(reward_id);
SELECT user_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM Users JOIN UserTransactions ON Users.user_id = UserTransactions.user_id GROUP BY user_name;
SELECT group_name, AVG(total_spending) AS avg_spending FROM Users JOIN LoyaltyGroups JOIN UserRewards ON Users.user_id = UserRewards.user_id GROUP BY group_name;
SELECT user_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM Users JOIN UserTransactions ON Users.user_id = UserTransactions.user_id GROUP BY user_name;
SELECT user_name, SUM(points_required) AS total_points FROM Users JOIN UserRewards ON Users.user_id = UserRewards.user_id JOIN Rewards ON UserRewards.reward_id = Rewards.reward_id GROUP BY user_name;
SELECT user_name, transaction_amount FROM Users JOIN UserTransactions ON Users.user_id = UserTransactions.user_id WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM UserTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500);
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM UserTransactions WHERE Users.user_id = UserTransactions.user_id);
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM UserTransactions WHERE Users.user_id = UserTransactions.user_id);
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users WHERE total_spending > (SELECT AVG(total_spending) FROM Users);
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users WHERE total_spending = (SELECT MAX(total_spending) FROM Users);
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users WHERE total_spending BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users WHERE user_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT user_name, total_spending FROM Users WHERE total_spending NOT BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT AVG(total_spending) FROM Users;
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) FROM UserTransactions;
SELECT group_name, COUNT(*) AS loyalty_members FROM LoyaltyGroups LEFT JOIN Users ON LoyaltyGroups.group_id = Users.user_id GROUP BY group_name;
SELECT user_name, points_required FROM Users JOIN UserRewards ON Users.user_id = UserRewards.user_id JOIN Rewards ON UserRewards.reward_id = Rewards.reward_id WHERE group_id = 1;

SELECT user_name, SUM(points_required) AS total_points FROM Users JOIN UserRewards ON Users.user_id = UserRewards.user_id JOIN Rewards ON UserRewards.reward_id = Rewards.reward_id GROUP BY user_name HAVING total_points > 1000;
SELECT user_name, COUNT(reward_id) AS number_of_rewards FROM Users JOIN UserRewards ON Users.user_id = UserRewards.user_id GROUP BY user_name HAVING number_of_rewards >= 3;
